reference.shortdesc: A keywords element contains a list of terms that applies to the topic or map.

section.title: Usage information
section.p: Key words in keywords are used to help find content in the topic. For example, keyword elements can be supplied as key words to search engines, and indexterm elements can be collected for a document index.

While the keyword element can be used inline, the keywords element is not an inline element. The keywords element only appears in the topicmeta or prolog, and is used to specify keywords that apply to the topic.

section.title: Processing expectations
section.p: All keyword and/or indexterm elements in the keywords element are considered part of the topic's metadata and should be reflected in the output as appropriate for the output medium.
